#Problem: https://www.hackerrank.com/challenges/reduced-string/problem
#-----Solution-----
n, k = [int(x) for x in input().split(" ")]

for i in range(k):
	if n%10 == 0:
		n = n//10
	else:
		n = n-1

print(n)


def main():
    n,k = map(int, input().split())
    for i in range(k):
        n = n - 1 if n % 10 != 0 else n // 10
    print(n)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()


def main():
	n,k = map(int, input().split())
	for _ in range(k):
		n = n - 1 if n % 10 != 0 else n // 10 # n = n - 1 if n % 10 != 0 else n / 10
	print(n)

if __name__ == '__main__':
	main()

#-----Solution-----
n, k = [int(x) for x in input().split(" ")]

for i in range(k):
	if n%10 == 0:
		n = n//10
	else:
		n = n-1

print(n)
